issue.title: [Java] Fix java-jar nightly on gh & self-hosted runners
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17211](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17211). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[ARROW-16943] added clean up to `java_full_build.sh` to fix issues with multiple jars when the job was run on a self-hosted (aka non-ephemeral) runner. This does fails when `.~/m2` does not exists.

I marked this as a blocker because this prevents us from building the release Jars.
cc: `[~kszucs]` `[~raulcd]`
